turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to order a COFFEE DRINK from Starbucks

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure thing, which store would you want to order from

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to order the one close to my home in kalanianaole in Hawaii kai, honolulu, hawaii

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you want to use the regular account for ordering

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: yes, let's use that account with starbucks

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sounds good, what kind of drink you want today

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I am feeling a mocha

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: any milk

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: yes, 2 percent

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: do you want additional flavor

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: of course, I am feeling like honey and some whipped cream on top would be nice

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sounds good, and

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want something fresh, let's make it extra minty

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: will do, anything else

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: have some chocolate chip thrown into the whipped cream

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: they have a drink called peppermint mocha that is similar to what you want

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I know, but this one should be cold

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: that is available

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I also want some shave ice in it, let's make it a peppermint frappuccino with chocolate and whipped cream on top

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: will do, your receipt will be sent to your mobile device

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I just received it

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: the order is waiting for you at the store

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: thank you
